title: Wealth Mindset: Tap the power within
description: Wealth Mindset – Is a self-help book with exercises throughout to help you remove all fears and blocks that are keeping you from becoming successful in life. You will learn visualization, affirmations, and other techniques of suggestions that will bring a change in your life by affecting your behavior and helping you reach your goals.This is not a get rich scheme, this is about you learning to connect with that infinite mind inside of you and create the life that you want, not the life that you don't want. There is a power within you that many call the Subconscious Mind. I like to call it “Infinite Mind”. Everyone has this infinite mind inside of them, but few know how to connect with it to bring about changes in one’s life. I have researched this for over 30 years, and I know how to put the techniques in the right combinations so, you can see results manifesting within 90 days.In addition, you will learn:Learn what are your two most powerful qualities. One lady in California used these two powerful qualities (attributes) and was able to create the winning lottery for herself $112,000,000 in 90 days.What is the Universal Law that is more powerful than the law of attraction?Your brain is a transmitter and receiver? Learn what that means for your life.Learn the power of your Attention.There are many techniques to learn in this book, that will help you create the life you want.Plus, much more…….Wealth Mindset, Tap the Power Within – is your how-to-guide on creating the life you want!Buy a copy today! What do you have to lose? Try it out for 90 days and watch your life change for the better and watch your dreams come true.
author: Patricia  Mitchell
